website_summaries.verdict: If you can live without 3D gameplay, the New 2DS XL does everything else just as well as the 3DS, but at a more affordable price.
pros: Has all of the features of the New 3DS XL without the 3D gameplay for at least $50 less
Is available in orange or turquoise
Makes for an excellent first video game system for kids
cons: No 3D gameplay, but 3D isn’t recommended for kids under 6 years old anyway

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for those that want a lighter Handheld console. It plays all 3DS Games, just in 2D. Fine by me! The 3D function kinda hurt my eyes a bit anyway. The 2DS XL gets a 10 out of 10!
customer_reviews.author: HSM

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Broken
customer_reviews.text: My son was so excited to receive this gift from “Santa.” Unfortunately, the item arrived broken. Once he turned it on the screen where it asks to choose a language would not accept a language with either the enclosed own or buttons. The device was stuck. We tried trouble shooting using YouTube videos and nothing worked. Christmas morning was full of tears instead of smiles because of this device. It also took a long time to ship originally, and the expected arrival date changed multiple times. We are returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: RunningMom4

customer_reviews.title: Not For Autistic Daughter
customer_reviews.text: This system is nice looking but not as user friendly for my autistic daughter as previous systems. She will have a hard time with this but will be disappointed if I return. Also, only came with quickstart brochure and not a user manual. Can download one but its way to many pages and not going to waste my paper and ink. I'm sure its a great system for everyone else, just not us.
customer_reviews.author: Tobywoby

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Portable Play
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Nintendo handheld of the DS line. The size is great & it's lightweight, for my small pained hands. I can play all day before the battery dies. I really enjoy Mario Kart 7, which is preloaded on the device. The speaker placement is not a problem for me with the way I hold the DS. I like that the ports for the game cartridge & micro SD card have a cover, so you don't accidentally pop out the cartridge or dust doesn't get in. Everything feels like good quality to me & I wouldn't hesitate to purchase another, should I ever feel the need for another design or want to give one as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: aGirlNamedAmy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic little gaming system
customer_reviews.text: This is very fun to play, plus you can download all of the old school games like Mario Bros, Dr. Mario, etc for cheap and have a fun portable gaming system. Battery lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Coralie

customer_reviews.title: Beware, didn’t get what was ordered.
customer_reviews.text: Listed as new but the pictures show what I received. Definitely NOT new. Not in a box, the stylus didn’t fit. Turned on and wouldn’t turn off.
customer_reviews.author: RMS

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put down
customer_reviews.text: Can’t put it down. Been playing a bunch of Pokémon games on the virtual console. Waiting for the switch to get it together.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Elaine

customer_reviews.title: International Buyers and People Who Travel Often Beware
customer_reviews.text: It is what you expect, well built and fun portable game console. The problem with international buyers like me is that the included charger doesn't work on 220-240 V 50 hz (basically the entire world except America & Japan) power. You need to buy a separate charger. I guess this would be a problem for people who live in America but travel internationally often too. Not including a charger that works internationally in 2019 is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Isik

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement
customer_reviews.text: My son ordered this with his birthday money. He was so excited for it to arrive. The description said it was new. When we got it, it was in a mailer bag, no packaging, with a kid named Noah’s info written in sharpie on the back, and the screen was broken.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra V.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised, looks and works great. My 4 year old figured it out fairly quickly. We did buy a separate case and car charger for it as well. Mario kart is pre-loaded.
customer_reviews.author: A. McClune

customer_reviews.title: Need for New Games
customer_reviews.text: We had to buy this version in order to play the new Minecraft game. My Daughter is thrilled with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT DROP!
customer_reviews.text: This is my son's, and he absolutely loves it, which makes me very happy. However, this is his second one since March. He dropped his first one which KO'd it completely, and the warranty does not cover drops. I took it to two local very reputable repair shops, and neither would touch it. They both said the wiring is extremely delicate and breaks easily during repair...you end up paying more for repairs than the console is worth. Very disappointed that Nintendo put out such a fragile product. So if your child is a butterfingers with their electronics, I would have second thoughts, unless you're ready and willing to purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: Russell J. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Love the orange & white color of the 2ds xl!
customer_reviews.author: Twanette

customer_reviews.title: Buyers Beware broken Nintendo doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a Christmas present and This was supposed to be a brand new Nintendo 2 DS Xl but what I received instead was a broken Nintendo as you can see in the middle right hand corner of the screen on the DS . The Nintendo was without it's original box and I cannot get the DS to turn on or work very disappointed buyers beware .
customer_reviews.author: littletink08

customer_reviews.title: In great working order!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this WAY early for Christmas (I'm crazy, I know) for my 6 year old. When my kids were asleep, I turned it on to check to see if it broke (as I've seen in other reviews). It wasn't broken and worked perfectly. I took the time to go and turn on parental controls and such and get to know the system. No problems whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Wargo

customer_reviews.title: Wobbly hinges apparently normal
customer_reviews.text: I love Nintendo products... this is a nice system. Does a bunch of stuff I don’t need but whatever. My only complaint is the loose screen hinges, on mine one side shifts slightly up and down, besides the normal play between hinge clicks... after a few google and reddit searches sounds like the hinges are loose on purpose... I thought about returning for another but it doesn’t sound like it would make a difference due to inconsistency in the product. So that’s a little annoying to me but the system works well otherwise. I would still recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Re: Nintendo 2DS - Using Screen Protectors
customer_reviews.text: Received Nintendo 2DS about two weeks ago have been enjoying it tremendously. This newer version is lighter making it comfortable to use. I love the games that are available! I just want to give a warning in regards to screen protectors that adhere to the screens for protection. I was in a panic when after installing the protective film on both screens the unit no longer worked!!! The control buttons would not respond even when I tapped on the screen the unit remained non responsive! At first I thought that I had damages the unit when I applied the protective film but I was thrilled when after removing the film the unit worked perfectly!!!
customer_reviews.author: debradarling

customer_reviews.title: nice product for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is easily one of the best hand held consoles of the history, nevertheleast the mario game on it freezed once, I dont know why, and I had to reset the console. nice battery life, you should turn off the wi-fi, low the bright setting and always use earphones, that would give you like 7 hours of play, I 'll suggest to play no more than 1 hour at time and let the console rest so yourselft.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: my son loves it
customer_reviews.text: bought for a 5 year old for his birthday. also have one for our eight year old. keeps them entertained. durable as our 5 year old often drops it. definitely recommend screen protectors.
customer_reviews.author: ryan chamberlain

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Works great, holds a good charge
customer_reviews.text: Make sure to know the difference between the 2DS XL and NEW 2DS XL. I don’t buy a ton of games as I use consoles more, but when I browse games I see that complaint ALL THE TIME. People buy the older model thinking “new” just means it’s not pre owned. Big mistake by Nintendo for not naming them differently, but this version can play a lot more games. Regardless, I enjoy it for the “cartridge” games a bit but mainly to have the old classics you can buy and download and play anytime on a plain, hotel, or when the wife is watching a show I don’t want too lol. Older Mario’s, donkey Kong’s, Zelda, poker games, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick G

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my boyfriend. Its super light and very well thought out. No scratches, no scuffs, it also ce with a charger!
customer_reviews.author: kimberly guzman  argueta

customer_reviews.title: 4 1/2 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my son and he loves its. Works great. The only down side is that the stylus falls off all the time. I actually bought an other one in blue for my other son and in that one the stylus fits perfectly. Had to buy them seperatley because the seller allowed only one purchase of the 2DS XL per customer. Could not return the DS because it was a Christmas girft and I had bought it 2 months before. Although I did test them out before Christmas to make sure they work and they did but I didn't put any thought into that detail (stylus). Other than that is a very good console.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Bleeding light
customer_reviews.text: A decent well made cheaper version of the 3ds, I got this instead because the 3d effects give me a headache and didnt need to pay for something I want going to use, I really like the color combination of this particular one, and it feels sturdy when playing it, my only complaint is that I played it at night and noticed on the top panel around and even away from the screen the light was bleeding through the plastic, I dont know if the paint or plastic is thick enough around random areas but i have looked up AMD saw many people having the same issues
customer_reviews.author: Erik Heerdt

customer_reviews.title: IT'S ACTNG VERY WONKY
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the Nintendo for my kid after the DS lite crapped out after a good 8 years. It seemed to work fine the first few times playing before starting to have some issues. The gaming console starts to get abnormally hot, even when all games and applications are closed and the Nintendo is just in sleep mode. Then yesterday, it wouldn't turn on for two whole hours even though it was fully charged and the blue power light was on but the screen remained black. We're afraid to turn it off again period in case it won't turn on again at all.
customer_reviews.author: GH

customer_reviews.title: Already glitching!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it, but it’s already glitching! I made sure to buy a protective case, screen protectors and carrying case and it’s still having technical issues. We had to order a special screw driver to take the back off and check the electronics per research online. We are really disappointed that it didn’t last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s alright.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had my 2ds Xl for about 3 weeks now and it’s alright. The games on it are fun and it’s a very pretty system. I just wish the build quality were a little better. Whenever I grip my 2ds Xl I feel like i’m crushing it in my hands. The plastic feels fragile. In fact, i’ve noticed that the piece of plastic above my circle pad is actually slightly bent down (presumably from pressing on it too hard). I feel like I have to grip it very lightly and because of that the 2ds Xl is rather uncomfortable to hold. I wish the New 3ds Xl was still in production, but the 2ds isn’t too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Loewenthal

customer_reviews.title: Great Value System
customer_reviews.text: Came in brand new and was effortless to setup. Stylish and sleek, it has plenty of undervalued and iconic games alike both physically and digitally available to collect. Plus it coming with a free game installed is a nice bonus. Mario Kart is a timeless series. The 2DS XL is definitely the best of the DS lineup in general, and best valued portable game system too. And this is coming from a long time console gamer.
customer_reviews.author: Nick T

customer_reviews.title: Santa uses Amazon?
customer_reviews.text: The first DS stopped working after 1-2 weeks of use. The replacement arrived with a defective screen. This was originally a Christmas gift from "Santa" and I had to connect my ability to exchange it with the mystery of Santa. I'm not happy about that.
customer_reviews.author: Blessings

customer_reviews.title: Love It! Definitely worth the $
customer_reviews.text: So happy I bought this. It plays games from the original DS and also the 3DS. I ordered this because my pink ds lite limited edition just stopped charging and working and I was looking for that one. But to buy that new was $100 more than this one. And when I saw this one I was like ok and then I saw I can connect to the internet and be able to Download games on it i was sold. And it cost just as much as I paid for the DS lite a couple years back. And it came with a game already downloaded on it! Can't complain! I love the colors as well.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Tice

customer_reviews.title: Great System!
customer_reviews.text: I was torn between a Switch or 2DS/3DS and I just couldn't justify spending the extra money on something I really just wanted to play casual. Plus I really wanted to play Ocarina of Time again (not to mention others). I'm so glad I got my 2DSXL, I love it! The 3D fad is starting to fade, so I'm glad I didn't spend the extra money for just 3D.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great system!
customer_reviews.text: I love the new Nintendo 2DS XL! I bought it for my son for Christmas but I think I play it more. He had a 3DS XL and to be honest, I like this better. It’s lighter and the screens look just as good. It was easy to transfer the information from the 3DS XL to the 2DS XL and even all the games I bought on the old one were downloadable on the new system. Love the beautiful color also! Great system!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: It was alright
customer_reviews.text: Not to bad so far outside of the fact that I couldn’t use the screen protector on it which makes me upset since it’s for my younger son. No other problems so far..
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Wright

customer_reviews.title: 3ds has been discontinued buy now!
customer_reviews.text: Just got my new 2ds xl and I am very happy with it if you guys don't know the 2ds and 3ds in general have been discontinued so right now is the best time to buying 1. Anyways the shipping was fast and it came in great packaging I 100% recommend
customer_reviews.author: Cornelio Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased customer!
customer_reviews.text: Great console! The 2DSXL was in perfect working condition and it is amazing. I loved the quality of the presentation (bought in "NEW" condition) and everything was in top shape. I am very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Tibbitts

customer_reviews.title: Nintendo
customer_reviews.text: My grandson really enjoys it! It came with Mario pre-installed, We can't figure out how to play the games that were purchased separately. I would of gave it 5 stars! Update..Gamestop sold my grandson 3 used games for $60 that didn't work. one not working...maybe, but all 3 games. Took advantage of 9 year old...They just lost my business!
customer_reviews.author: Chaching62

customer_reviews.title: Keeps freezing!!! Can’t use it
customer_reviews.text: Daughter has just started playing with us in the last couple weeks and it’s freezing up and won’t work for her we have googled and tried a lot of things and also try to get a hold of the company andIt says that we cannot return the product after January 31. In that case I have no way to get a hold of anybody or see how to fix this right now. Very expensive toy to not be able to get a hold of somebody.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Krafft

customer_reviews.title: new 2ds xl
customer_reviews.text: this item deserve full 5 star , but the item arrive to me inside a box bigger than the original new 2ds xl box, and nothing inside the big box to hold the original box ? the good news is the original box look great and nothing on it , but I am not going to open the box or use the 2ds so I do not know if the device working or not , anyway I will keep it with my collection
customer_reviews.author: Alliamos

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect conditions, good in-hand feeling, easy to carry and the Mario Kart game included is a great added value!
customer_reviews.author: JReyes

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't turn on.
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure the device is wonderful, if it worked. Hasn't worked out of the box. Been charging for 5 hours now, and still won't power on. Charging light lights up, but won't turn on. Needless to say, I have a very disappointed nephew, as this was a Christmas gift he was super excited for.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought to play when i have downtime at work. then i noticed i wasn't doing any work. i had to put it away and save it for road trips. battery life is about 6 hours.
customer_reviews.author: William Marler

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted one of these for a long time. I had the small size new Nintendo 3ds and it was giving me hand cramps because I have huge hands for such a small woman. I never played in 3d so the 3d functionality wasn't important. I haven't played it much yet but I'm sure the bigger size will help keep my hand from cramping up!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Maestro

customer_reviews.title: I love this handheld console!
customer_reviews.text: I'm very pleased with the Nintendo 2DS XL! My favorite games on the system so far are Tomodachi Life and Animal Crossing: New Leaf, and it runs them perfectly. I'm looking forward to the nice, varied game library that I can enjoy on this console, as it supports all games of the 2Ds/3Ds family. The turquoise and black look so nice, too! I'm 22 and I'm so happy to have the opportunity to enjoy this handheld for the first time, as I never got to enjoy a DS when I was younger. I am very happy with this device. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M. Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Pretty color!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this. The color is really pretty, too! She likes this better than her 3DS because it’s lighter weight & she said the 3D gives her a headache.
customer_reviews.author: P. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little handheld
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 2DS XL for my gf cause I accidentally spilled liquid on her OG 3DS XL. She loves the color and doesn't mind the fact that it doesn't have the 3D capability cause it strained here eyes I guess. It came with Mario Cart pre-installed I believe which is a pretty awesome little bonus. Package came in perfect condition and the console itself feels considerably lighter than it's predecessor. All in all a great buy even in 2020 2DS XL is still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Worst Christmas gift I've ever bought someone.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my girlfriend as a Christmas present. As shown, the box it came in was teared through, but the Amazon shipping box was in mint condition. The 2DS XL showed a few scuffs on the outside, but what was worse was the hit it took on one of its sides, breaking the shell itself and rendering the C-stick useless. Needless to say, this is a very disappointing purchase and I'll be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Andres Gomez

customer_reviews.title: 130.00 is a steal.
customer_reviews.text: this package even come with a AC adapter/charger, unlike the normal "3DS xl". "Mario Kart 7" got deleted over data transfer, but i have a hard copy anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Hua, Jin Chen

customer_reviews.title: 9/10  MicroSD card trouble
customer_reviews.text: This Item was amazing until I switched on the system to boot it up.. the sd card was not able to read... after a while of trying to figure it out I had to fix the actual sd card with my laptop to make it compatible with the 2ds xl... but other than that this product came perfectly packaged and arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Confusing Amazon interface
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled with the product I received however the options to choose specific deals, such as the Zelda promo codes and the latte, was a bit confusing to choose from so I would caution buyers beware be sure to pick the correct color and product.
customer_reviews.author: John Bado

customer_reviews.title: I like it in general
customer_reviews.text: I like it in general , but there was an issue with top screen on the top & down left corners . They are showing darker light compared with the other areas of the screen . However , everything else works fine and very nice portable gaming device which I really like .
customer_reviews.author: MHD

customer_reviews.title: Works when it wants to
customer_reviews.text: The system won’t shut off properly or get out of the games like it should, leaving us with a black screen with a power button light and a WiFi light. We just have to wait until it decides to work. Not thrilled. This started two weeks after purchasing 😢.
customer_reviews.author: Idesofavalon

customer_reviews.title: Bought before but returned this one.
customer_reviews.text: I returned this one as I decided to get my daughter a switch lite instead. Gave 5 stars as it is not the products fault and I have bought one before however not through amazon and still own it. No issues with it. Perfect for a kid that you dont want to have the 3d option but want the xl and capability of playing any ds game.
customer_reviews.author: DAAL

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we wanted.
customer_reviews.text: 3DS is neat and all...But not too easy on the eyes. Glad there's this giant 2DS for us old people.
customer_reviews.author: Ryno D. Bones

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended—you’ll get a used one that doesn’t have the listed software.
customer_reviews.text: So far the system seems to working properly, but the console I receive appears to be used. There are scuff marks on the back and greasy finger prints on both of the screens. I was able to clean the screens but can’t do anything about the scratches which sucks because I coughed up an extra $100 to get this specific color over another one. The Mario Kart game which is supposed to come pre-downloaded is also not on the system.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Halligan

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: Box was a little beat up when it arrived so I was initially worried about how the game was but my son loves it! Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Corey Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this. I was a little concerned because we had bought her sister a Nintendo Dsi 3D, but the 2D plays same games and she can actually draw on it.
customer_reviews.author: June L.Cain

customer_reviews.title: Nice aesthetics and quality
customer_reviews.text: Got it as a gift for someone. The colors are pretty and the texture of the plastic is nice. Connected to work nicely. Pokemon played good. Nice loud speakers. So far she said it's still working good (has owned for 5 months)
customer_reviews.author: Dwarfer 169

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It was charged when I got it and got the game before hand. I think they might have sent a 3d xl by mistake. When the game starts, it says 3d. But maybe it is just a thing. And the best life lasts a long time. I charged foil and didn't have to charge it floor three days. I am not on it all day though.
customer_reviews.author: Van

customer_reviews.title: product would not charge- looked used (scratched) had to send back could not get it to charge
customer_reviews.text: bought it brand new- yet it looked used. also could not get it to charge. the light would come on for 5-10 seconds then go off. Would not charge. so dissapointed. however amazon's return policy was wonderful. Also it took forever to get here
customer_reviews.author: janice brawdy

customer_reviews.title: It's a improvement over the OG 2DS.
customer_reviews.text: My younger brother, and I had the OG 2DS(es), and these ones are a huge improvement over those ones (the OG 2DS) in terms of playing games with little to no slowdown. As you can tell there's no 3D effect in the sense of wearing 3D glasses, like the OG 3DS(es) but that is more of a gimmick. Still I would pick this since it saves money when it comes to the OG 3DS(es) while being more pricey than the OG 2DS(es) it runs better than those ones.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Aponte

customer_reviews.title: Fastest delivery ever
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this game for my five years son for his 5th birthday present on 7/22/2020. It was supposed to be delivery between 7/31-8/5 but surprisingly the game arrived 7/27/20. My baby loves it and set-up was so easy.
customer_reviews.author: Manasuma Kamara

customer_reviews.title: Games on the go
customer_reviews.text: This is going to be a gift, but I tried it and got it set up. Love it! Portable and easy to use. Can't wait to give it for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: JKJK123

customer_reviews.title: Terrible camera, great device otherwise, plays ALL ds games!
customer_reviews.text: Its a great hand held device but the camera on both sides is AWFUL quality. I do like that you can use any DS games with this device though, original DS, 2ds & 3ds games all work!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Ables

customer_reviews.title: No Pre-Installment
customer_reviews.text: Came in perfect condition with the charger, stylus, and micro so card, but I ordered it new so that was expected. However I'm docking not just one, but two stars because I was severely disappointed that Mario Kart didn't come pre-installed like the description said it would
customer_reviews.author: Marisol Soto

customer_reviews.title: Screen came with dead pixels, Amazon couldn't replace it.
customer_reviews.text: The console itself is awesome, if you receive it in one piece. Charger was broken and you can see the problem on the screen.
customer_reviews.author: a guy

customer_reviews.title: BEST GIFT EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 9 year old Grandson for Christmas and it was THE BEST GIFT EVER!! After doing much research I decided the 2DS XL would be the gaming system he would love as he can play 3DS games on it. I don't have to give up my iPhone for him to play games anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Rima Duhon

customer_reviews.title: Buy the XL foldable. It will not break as easy.
customer_reviews.text: This version of the 2DS XL works great and is much more durable than the last one I had, which broke when I rolled onto it in the middle of the night. Don't buy a cheap version. Get this one or another foldable XL like it. It is worth it because they do not easily break and you can better see the screen.
customer_reviews.author: John T. Camm

customer_reviews.title: Rip off!
customer_reviews.text: It came in a bag and it was missing it’s so card so now it will not read and SD card I put in it and I can not play my 3DS xl games or take pictures or do anything that requires a SD card.
customer_reviews.author: cocojipc

customer_reviews.title: Fun.
customer_reviews.text: Very cool system. Thought for an older system price should be lower.
customer_reviews.author: sassy pants6

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Product shipped and arrived on time. I got exactly what I was looking for, with the predownloaded game included.
customer_reviews.author: Rene

customer_reviews.title: a few improvements over the 3ds series.
customer_reviews.text: very similar to the 3ds. the 3ds was great and so is this one. Loses the 3D option, which is no big loss.
customer_reviews.author: andy d.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Having so much fun with this product. Playing lots of games and with its lighter verson than the older model ...i can play longer...yay what a no e product
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my husband and he had no idea!! I needed a new one and he loves this one!!! It arrived safe and sound! Shipping was great as well!
customer_reviews.author: kitty20

customer_reviews.title: Great pricing
customer_reviews.text: Works great, looks great and my Son and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: "Used Okay"  - Nope
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this as a new unit came in a generic box stating "new - used okay" Missing the micro sd card and just placed in a plastic bag. I will be returning today.
customer_reviews.author: Mealy58

customer_reviews.title: Still linked to old user
customer_reviews.text: Used product came already linked to the old Nintendo user and we cannot delete it. No downloads or data transfers can be completed without having access to the old users linked account. Be careful when buying used products.
customer_reviews.author: jen0001

customer_reviews.title: Love this ds!!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this ds so much! We upgraded him so he could play Minecraft with his brother. Apparently he could t do that on his old 2ds. This is just like the 3ds but without the 3D. I won’t let my kids have the 3D due to eye issues. This fits their needs perfectly. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Bluebird

customer_reviews.title: As advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Looks and runs like brand new. I thought they ripped me off for the Mario Kart 7, but I finally figured out how to re-download it. I'm very happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Someone is living on my porch,  apparently.
customer_reviews.text: The product was fine but it was not handed directly to anybody. It was left on our front porch. No one else lives here but us so I don't know who is living on the porch that they handed the package to. 😉🤨🤔🙄
customer_reviews.author: Michael Merrill

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: My sons both love theirs! Who needs to pay extra for 3D when this one plays all DS games, including the 3ds ones (just not in 3d)?!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son for Christmas this past year. It will not hold a charge. Ill put in on the charger and it will be fully charged and then within 20 minutes of playing it will shut off and the battery will appear as its dead. And of course its now out of the return window. Extremely unsatisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: thunderboy

customer_reviews.title: Nice but seems fragile
customer_reviews.text: Despite being of relatively low quality, a surprise from Nintendo, it's still pretty nice. You'll certainly have to be more careful than usual with the hinge.
customer_reviews.author: Devin Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Great system, lite, and great battery. I take this everywhere
customer_reviews.author: Philly Billy

customer_reviews.title: I love you nintendo
customer_reviews.text: Quite a bit from each Nintendo system is available on here. Well no switch. But games from nes super Nintendo 64 remakes GB, GBA, plus a ton of ds and 3ds games available on the Nintendo store. Worth every penny. Even got donkey Kong country from 1994. Buy it now while you can still do it.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Dude

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great deal for the price, especially if you love Mario Kart. I've had my DS for roughly a month, and I've already sunk so many hours of gaming into it. If you're a fan of hand held gaming and you don't have a DS yet, I highly recommed buying one.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Foster

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: No problems at all with this. Speaker placement is not an issue at all, sound is great. Picture is just like any other DS XL. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: BCH

customer_reviews.title: Great game that will last for a long time.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my nephew. He loves it. Plays it all the time. Arrived extremely fast and just as described. I highly recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: Chris_W

customer_reviews.title: Still fun!
customer_reviews.text: I know some services are no longer functional, but you can still enjoy every game. I bought it to play a few classics I missed like TLOZ:OOT
customer_reviews.author: Enrique

customer_reviews.title: Circle pad is meh (feels gritty, doesn't move smooth), so-so screens, small dpad, expensive
customer_reviews.text: So-so screens, way expensive for what we get, circle pad on half the units doesn't move smoothly. Personal issue: dpad too small for comfort. I'd give this console 2.5 stars if that was an option.
customer_reviews.author: Nitai

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: The D pad was a little loose, but other than that in perfect condition. Unfortunately, Mario Kart 7 is downloaded onto a 4gb sd card, meaning if you want a bigger card, you have to loose the game, but still an excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Whitmer

customer_reviews.title: Dead pixels
customer_reviews.text: Had a few dead pixels but I don't play enough to care. Was going to return it but decided to keep it. Games are still playable.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Great.  Fast Shipping
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter Loves It. Only Five. Years. Priceless Fir Smiles On Her
customer_reviews.author: william torres

customer_reviews.title: Mario all the way.
customer_reviews.text: This was an anniversary gift for my husband. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Washko

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed. Stopped working only 2 months after purchasing. It started freezing on the screen for no reason and then completely stopped turning on.
customer_reviews.author: Cadri Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Bought for the amiibo support
customer_reviews.text: Just as good as a 3DS but cheaper, bigger, and with amiibo support. The 3D is fun but I rarely use it. If I really need the 3D I can use my old original 3DS.
customer_reviews.author: checkmeowt

customer_reviews.title: DS
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth one bought specially for Harvest Moon game. Not gotten into it yet, but work well.
customer_reviews.author: B. Segal

customer_reviews.title: Awesome system !
customer_reviews.text: Came perfect, my niece loves it. I bought a second one for my son. Easy to use my 5 year old loves it.
customer_reviews.author: LeanneMarie

customer_reviews.title: Broken and Inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: Product did not work. Nintendo 2DS was labeled as “New”. After a day of using it it would turn off randomly and now it won’t even turn on at all. I called Nintendo and they told me after searching the serial number that the product was not new and warranty had expired.
customer_reviews.author: marcio midence

customer_reviews.title: Yayy!
customer_reviews.text: Great product my son was so excited to get it !!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: I love it and very happy
customer_reviews.text: wow this Nintendo 2 D's xl system is the best one ever the game images looks so vibrant and lively and very clear and beautiful I am very happy with it and yes I recommended it you won't be disappointed trust me this will be the best purchase ever .I thank you
customer_reviews.author: moonfairy

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my daughter she loves it perfect for those long car rides great service fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: gary

product_meta.title: New Nintendo 2DS XL Handheld Game Console - Orange + White With Mario Kart 7 Pre-installed - Nintendo 2DS
product_meta.description: Color:Orange + White| Style:New Nintendo 2DS XLStep up to XL screens in a lightweight, go-anywhere system. Gamers of all ages can play in style with the New Nintendo 2DS XL system. It gives you the power of the New Nintendo 3DS XL system in a streamlined, affordable package-and plays a huge library of games in 2D.
feature_bullets: Colorful accents add style, while the sleek clamshell design makes it comfortable to hold. A fast processor offers short loading times
The C Stick brings enhanced controls (like intuitive camera control) to compatible games, while ZL and ZR buttons give you plenty of options
You can play all Nintendo 3DS, New Nintendo 3DS and most Nintendo DS games in 2D on this system
Tap an amiibo figure to the near-field communication (NFC) reader on the lower screen to enjoy amiibo features in compatible games

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,752 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
